mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fremont, John C. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Fremont, John C.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: His Excellency Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling May 19 1862. By Telegraph from Franklin 19 1862. Some time Since I gave you the names of Edward Hetcher & Seubat the first to be major and the Second Capt of Infantry both have Seen much active Service Speak English Like masters[?] & are much needed now will you Send commission also if you wish to Promote Keenan now first 1st Lieut Eighth 8 Va Send commission accordingly & I will muster him in JC Fremont Maj Genl Comdg 64Gs266pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fremont, John C.
Franklin, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
